item.title: Comma.ai
item.description: Data visualization of car rides in the bay area. Github Repository: https://github.com/luccabb/comma.ai

item.title: Github Explorer
item.description: Github explorer, built using Github API and React. Github Repository: https://github.com/luccabb/github_explorer

item.title: Github Repositories
item.description: Github Repositories list, Fullstack application (Backend, Frontend, Mobile) built using Github API, React, React Native, and Node. Backend: https://github.com/luccabb/simple_node_local_backend. Frontend: https://github.com/luccabb/simple_react_frontend. Mobile: https://github.com/luccabb/simple_reactnative_frontend.

item.title: Marketplace App
item.description: Marketplace App, Frontend Mobile built with React Native. Github Repository: : https://github.com/luccabb/simple_react_native.

item.title: NGOs
item.description: Platform to register NGOs help cases, fullstack application (Backend, Frontend, Mobile) built using React, React Native, and Node. Github Repository: https://github.com/luccabb/ngos.

item.title: Social Media
item.description: Social Media platform, build with Ruby on Rails. Github Repository: https://github.com/luccabb/sample_app.

item.title: Transactions Dashboard
item.description: Transactions Dashboard, Frontend and Backend built respectively with React and Node. Frontend: https://github.com/luccabb/node_transactions_react. Backend:https://github.com/luccabb/node_simple_transactions.

item.title: Dog API
item.description: Web app random generator of Dog Images. Github Repository: https://github.com/luccabb/dogApi
